Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Jeffrey
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains running with residual delays & congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses are available between Harlem and Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays at Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays at Addison due to an earlier mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
